paragraph.heading: 1Attribute symbols
paragraph.paragraph:
In both trees of the
00_introduction.xml object tool , objects are displayed. Two categories are made for each objects: its attributes (grouped under the `attributes' folder
16 16 ../../../../../images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_attribute_symbol.gif ) and its once routines (grouped under the `once routines' folder
16 16 ../../../../../images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_once_symbol.gif ).
All follow the following symbol scheme to describe the kind of each item:

list.item:
16 16 ../../../../../images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_immediate_value.gif An attribute of a basic type, such as
INTEGER /libraries/base/reference/kernel/integer.html
,
DOUBLE /libraries/base/reference/kernel/double.html
,...
16 16 ../../../../../images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_object_symbol.gif An attribute that is a reference to anobject
